title: Why cant i get anymore keys
body: It's been about 3 weeks since i last got a key and I play a lot of games where i win a lot, I don't know why I'm not getting anymore keys

replies.body:
The drop rate for key fragments gradually decreases the more you find them, up to a total of 12.   This rate will then refresh about every 28 days later, and drop at an increased pace again.  

More information is also available through our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide, but I hope that helps clear things up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
